definition: (bird species of China) Arctic redpoll (Acanthis hornemanni)
(bird species of China) Arctic warbler (Phylloscopus borealis)

sentences.english: Out of the inner parts shall a tempest come, and cold out of the north.
sentences.chinese: 暴風來自南極密宮，嚴寒出自極北之地。

sentences.english: What rules govern the far north now?
sentences.chinese: 目前是哪些規則在控制極北地帶？

sentences.english: It would have looked as if Thule had been attacked with conventional weapons.
sentences.chinese: 看起來會像是極北被傳統武器攻擊了。

sentences.english: Looks like a worn and moulting Arctic Warbler.
sentences.chinese: 看起來像是隻羽毛磨損且正換羽中的極北柳鶯。

sentences.english: He showed her another image linked to the name ' Thule '.
sentences.chinese: 他向她展現連接到名叫‘極北之地’的另一幅圖象。

sentences.english: Northrend is the continent located far north of the Maelstrom.
sentences.chinese: 諾森德是位於大陸極北一片遙遠的大陸。

sentences.english: Aviation is the major transport in the Far North.
sentences.chinese: 極北地區主要的交通工具是飛機。

definition: Iwate prefecture in the north of Japan's main island Honshū 本州[Ben3 zhou1]
geographical position according to the principles of feng shui 風水|风水[feng1 shui3]/ley lines
enchanting scenery/beautiful surroundings/world of its own
